prompt: What is the eligibility for B.Tech?
response: You must have completed 10+2 with Physics, Chemistry, and Math with at least 60% marks.

prompt: What is the last date to apply?
response: The last date to apply for B.Tech is July 30, 2025.

prompt: What are the fees for MBA?
response: The MBA course fee is ₹1,20,000 per year.

prompt: How much is the hostel fee?
response: The hostel fee is ₹45,000 per year, including accommodation and meals.

prompt: What is the counseling process?
response: After qualifying the entrance exam, shortlisted candidates must attend counseling sessions for seat allocation and document verification.

prompt: What is the payment deadline for fees?
response: The payment deadline for tuition and hostel fees is August 5, 2025. Late payments may incur a penalty.

prompt: Can I pay fees in installments?
response: Yes, fees can be paid in two installments. Please contact the accounts office for details.

prompt: Which is better: B.Tech in CSE or IT?
response: Both CSE and IT offer good career prospects. CSE focuses more on core computing, while IT emphasizes information systems and management.

prompt: Is there support for Hindi language?
response: Yes, our chatbot supports both English and Hindi for answering queries.

prompt: How do I upload my resume for course suggestions?
response: You can upload your resume on the admissions portal, and our system will recommend suitable courses based on your profile.

prompt: What is the eligibility for M.Tech?
response: You must have a B.Tech or equivalent degree with at least 60% marks and a valid GATE score.

prompt: Are there any evening courses?
response: Yes, we offer evening courses for working professionals in select programs. Check the course catalog for details.

prompt: Can I get a refund if I withdraw my application?
response: Refunds are available if you withdraw before the admission deadline. Refer to the refund policy on our website.

prompt: What is the process for international students?
response: International students must submit their transcripts, passport, and English proficiency scores. Contact the international office for guidance.

prompt: How do I get a copy of the brochure?
response: You can download the college brochure from our website or request a printed copy by mail.

prompt: What is the minimum attendance required?
response: A minimum of 75% attendance is required to appear for semester exams.

prompt: Can I change my course after admission?
response: Course change requests are considered within the first two weeks of the semester, subject to seat availability.

prompt: Is there any entrance exam for MCA?
response: Yes, MCA admissions require qualifying the college entrance exam held in June.

prompt: When does the semester start?
response: The semester for all courses starts on August 10, 2025.

prompt: Can I get a scholarship?
response: Scholarships are available for meritorious and economically weaker students. Please check the scholarship section on our website.

prompt: What documents are required for application?
response: You need your 10+2 mark sheet, ID proof, passport-size photos, and entrance exam scorecard.

prompt: How do I apply online?
response: Visit our admissions portal, fill out the application form, upload documents, and pay the application fee online.

prompt: What is the intake for B.Tech?
response: The annual intake for B.Tech is 180 students.

prompt: What is the duration of MBA?
response: The MBA program duration is 2 years.

prompt: When will results be declared?
response: Results will be declared on July 15, 2025, on the college website.

prompt: What is the eligibility for MBA?
response: Graduation in any discipline with at least 50% marks and a valid entrance exam score.

prompt: How can I contact support?
response: You can email us at admissions@college.edu or call +91-1234567890 for assistance.
